choices.B: They must stay with an adult.
choices.C: They must wait in the car.
choices.D: They must bring their own life guard.

transcript.speaker: N
transcript.text: Welcome to the city swimming pool. Before entering the water, please take a shower and do some light stretching. Running around the pool is dangerous, so always walk. Children must stay with an adult at all times.

content.rationale: Children must always be with an adult.
